overview: Criminals threaten Suro Mantoro’s North-South trade and his guards are defeated. One of the dead is Srikandi’s father so Srikandi pursues her martial arts studies by ascetic meditation. She also has a thin blade that is almost invisible to the human eye. Suro Mantoro and Fatimah, whose father was also killed, want to advance their skills but their teacher refuses. He foresees that their problem will be resolved by Srikandi Mantili, the Eagle from the South. (Film Indonesia synopsis)
title: Hawk from the South
